name: Neo4j-Migrations (via SDKMAN)
description:
Neo4j-Migrations is a database migration and refactoring tool that allows
running Cypher scripts and programmatic refactorings in a controlled and
repeatable fashion against one or more Neo4j database.

version.description: Select the version of Neo4j-Migrations to install.

jdkVersion.description: Select or enter a JDK version to install.

jdkDistro.description: Select or enter a JDK distribution to install
